name: Autodarts Tools Source
subtitle: AltStore Source for Tools for Autodarts
description: Install and Update Tools for Autodarts directly through AltStore.

apps.name: Tools for Autodarts
apps.subtitle: Enhance your Autodarts experience
apps.localizedDescription: Tools for Autodarts is a browser extension that enhances your gaming experience on autodarts.io. It adds numerous quality-of-life features, customization options, and advanced functionality to make your Autodarts experience more enjoyable and personalized.

news.title: Tools for Autodarts now available!
news.caption: You can now install Tools for Autodarts via AltStore.
